Breaking: B.C. announces plan to move homeless ppl in encampments into hotels during COVID-19 pandemic
• Vancouver: Oppenheimer, ~300 ppl, BC/CoV has IDed 8 hotels, 2 emerg respone centres
• Victoria: Pandora Ave, Topaz Park, ~360ppl, 5+ hotels
• May 9 deadline for transition

BREAKING: Director of office involved in making coronavirus vaccine is filing a whistleblower complaint against the Trump Administration, saying his firing was retaliation after he questioned drugs Trump praised. He says “science, not politics or cronyism, has to lead the way.”
